Alan Bibby

Director

From a background in design, advertising and fine art, Alan Bibby directs commercials, fashion films and music videos, collaborating with artists such as Stevie Wonder, Ariana Grande, Pharrell, Zendaya, Coldplay and Rihanna, and global brands including Audi, Lexus, Microsoft, Google, Sony, Nike, Marc Jacobs, Honda, IBM and Budweiser.

His films have been shown at international festivals and museums including MoMA PS1 and the Museum of Art and Design in New York, the Tate Modern in London and Palais de Tokyo in Paris.
